pages.title: Trinity College Dublin Consent Program
pages.text:
Would you believe this sexual deve was asked to create visuals for Trinity College Dublin's Consent Program? Sincerely grateful to Aoife Grimes for getting me involved in a project I was particularly passionate about; teaching n√≠l to the young.

Watch the videos in full here

pages.title: Meatball
pages.text:
Featuring the talented tongues of Fiachra Corkery, Ellen O' Mahony and Euan Murphy, with thanks to Ross for the mugshot

Based on a comic from Cheers Vol. III

pages.title: Marshmallow
pages.text: What's pink and white, a sweet delight and preferably referred to as princess? Not me silly! It's this marshmallow themed music video I made for Elise Tricoteaux

pages.title: Smooth Mouth
pages.text: Willy's always wanted to be a rancher, now he's been put out to pasture

pages.title: Science Gallery Dublin
pages.text: Work for OPEN MIND, Science Gallery Dublin's aim to educate teenagers about their mental health, how to cope and most importantly, lets them know they're not alone

pages.title: KOJAQUE - Last Pint
pages.text:
Snf snf ! Do my nostrils deceive me? Is that the shtink of a midweek pint I shmell? and I, the wasp, circling it like a correct leaving cert answer ! just don't blame me if the bouncer doesn't let you back in

Music video for KOJAQUE's Last Pint animated and directed by our lad

pages.title: MK Ultrafilm
pages.text: Illustration for Mark and Killian's podcast

pages.title: Cheers Vol I-III
pages.text:
Meet an eclectic cast of characters including Doctor Baby, Conker Collins, the backward legged boy and "Meatball" Murphy, who's been playing a 20 year old game of hide and go seek chasing
Regale in my tales, such as the last holiday with my parents where I thought I'd died from partaking in a potentially harmful pinner, or learn how to tame a pet fly, and in doing so inherit nicknames such as "Bluebottles Billy", "Midgee Mcgee" or simply "Horsefly"

Each volume is 12 A6 pages of collected comics

If you are interested in purchasing a copy, feel free to email me at johnnycigarettex@gmail.com

pages.title: Cheers Vol IV-VI
pages.text:
Never delve into the depths of your garden again after learning of the legend of the Shelty Horn, discover what mummy and daddy do after midnight and get a glimpse into my exciting life as an illustrator where, in one instance, I mistakenly procure a nail clippers from someone else's pocket! It was horrible

Each volume is 12 A6 pages of collected comics

If you are interested in purchasing a copy, feel free to email me at johnnycigarettex@gmail.com

pages.title: Scenes from my Mind's Mezzanine
pages.text:
Scenes from my Mind's Mezzanine is a 12 page A6 full colour zine filled to the brim with lego sets of illustrations

If you are interested in purchasing a copy, feel free to email me at johnnycigarettex@gmail.com

sections.title: About
sections.heading: Johnny Cigarette
sections.text:
Keith Kavanagh, Kav, or Johnny Cigarette is an Irish Animator and Illustrator who likes the idea of making a living submitting videos to "You've Been Framed!".

Feel free to get in contact:
